title: Cultural Manifestations Sheet
description: Documents the visible, audible, and performed manifestations of a culture -- greetings, clothing, dining, body language, architecture, daily life, holidays, and folklore. Every manifestation should trace back to the culture's core values, beliefs, and morals.

culture_id.description: The culture these manifestations belong to

colloquialisms.description: Slang, expressions, and sayings unique to this culture

food_drink.description: Cultural food associations, staple dishes, seasonal foods, drinks, presentation style

clothing_norms.description: What people wear and what it signifies

hair_expectations.description: Hair style norms, facial hair expectations, cultural associations

body_modifications.description: Tattoos, piercings, branding, implants, scarification, and their cultural meanings

gestures.description: Culturally specific gestures and their meanings (including rude gestures)

architecture.description: Architectural style, materials, and the impression it creates

transportation.description: How people typically get around and cultural attitudes toward travel

rituals.description: Cultural rituals and ceremonies (birth, coming-of-age, marriage, death, seasonal)

folklore.description: Verbal, material, and customary folklore traditions

beauty_standards.description: What is considered beautiful, how age is viewed

accessories.description: Hats, wedding bands, functional accessories, and their cultural meanings

x-cross-references.culture-profile: These manifestations belong to a culture defined in a Culture Profile
x-cross-references.cultural-clash-planner: Differences in manifestations create cultural clashes
x-cross-references.religion-profile: Religious influences on daily life manifestations
